pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video device compatible with DirectX® 9.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX® 9.0
  • Additional Notes: Display with 1280x768 of resolution or higher
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video device compatible with DirectX® 9.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX® 9.0
  • Additional Notes: A quality sound system with subwoofer or headset
